mapper.sql: select post_id, post_code, post_name, post_sort, status, create_by, create_time, remark from system_post
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id FROM system_post p LEFT JOIN system_user_post up ON up.post_id = p.post_id AND up.`company_id` = p.`company_id` LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER u ON u.user_id = up.user_id AND u.`company_id` = up.`company_id` where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.company_id =#{companyId}

select p.post_id, p.post_name, p.post_code from system_post p left join system_user_post up on up.post_id = p.post_id and up.company_id = p.company_id left join system_user u on u.user_id = up.user_id and u.company_id = up.company_id where u.user_name = #{userName} and u.company_id =#{companyId}
mapper.insert: insert into system_post( post_id, company_id, post_code, post_name, post_sort, status, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{post.postId}, #{companyId}, #{post.postCode}, #{post.postName}, #{post.postSort}, #{post.status}, #{post.remark}, #{post.createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.delete: delete from system_post where post_id = #{postId} and company_id =#{companyId}
